title: TweenBase
content:

name: TweenBase
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Abstract base class for in-between interpolation handlers. Class.Tween
  inherits from Class.TweenBase.
description: |
  Abstract base class for in-between interpolation handlers; parent class of
  Class.Tween.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants:
  - Tween
tags:
  - NotCreatable
  - NotBrowsable
deprecationmessage: ''
properties:
  - name: TweenBase.PlaybackState
    summary: |
      Read-only property that shows the current state for the Class.Tween
      animation.
    description: |
      Read-only property that shows the current stage for the Class.Tween
      animation. See Enum.PlaybackState for descriptions of each state. Change
      using functions like Class.Tween:Play().
    codesamples:
      - Tween-PlaybackState
    type: PlaybackState
    tags:
      - ReadOnly
      - NotReplicated
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Behavior
    serialization:
      canload: false
      cansave: true
    capabilities: []
methods:
  - name: TweenBase:Cancel
    summary: |
      Halts playback and resets the tween variables. If you then call
      Class.TweenBase:Play(), the properties of the tween resume interpolating
      towards their destination, but take the full length of the animation to do
      so.
    description: |
      Halts playback of a Class.Tween and resets the tween variables.

      Only resets the tween variables, not the properties being changed by the
      tween. If you cancel a tween halfway through its animation, the properties
      do not reset to their original values. Differs from
      Class.TweenBase:Pause() in that once resumed, it takes the full duration
      of the tween to complete the animation.
    codesamples:
      - Tween-Cancel
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
  - name: TweenBase:Pause
    summary: |
      Halts playback of the tween. Doesn't reset its progress variables, meaning
      that if you call Class.TweenBase:Play(), the tween resumes playback from
      the moment it was paused.
    description: |
      Halts playback of the tween. Doesn't reset its progress variables, meaning
      that if you call Class.TweenBase:Play(), the tween resumes playback from
      the moment it was paused.

      If you want to reset the progress variables of the tween, use
      Class.TweenBase:Cancel().

      You can only pause tweens that are in the
      Class.TweenBase.PlaybackState|PlaybackState of
      Enum. PlaybackState.Playing; tweens in other states won't pause. If a
      tween is in a different Class.TweenBase.PlaybackState|PlaybackState such
      as Enum. PlaybackState.Delayed (as a result of its
      Datatype.TweenInfo.DelayTime being greater than 0), attempting to pause
      the tween will fail and the tween will play following its specified delay
      time.
    codesamples:
      - Tween-Pausing
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
  - name: TweenBase:Play
    summary: |
      Starts playback of a tween. Note that if playback has already started,
      calling Play() has no effect unless the tween has finished or is stopped
      (either by Class.TweenBase:Cancel() or Class.TweenBase:Pause()).
    description: |
      Starts playback of a tween. Note that if playback has already started,
      calling Play() has no effect unless the tween has finished or is stopped
      (either by Class.TweenBase:Cancel() or Class.TweenBase:Pause()).

      Multiple tweens can be played on the same object at the same time, but
      they must not animate the same property. If two tweens attempt to modify
      the same property, the initial tween is cancelled and overwritten by the
      most recent tween (see examples).
    codesamples:
      - Tween-Creation
      - Tween-Conflict
    parameters: []
    returns:
      - type: ()
        summary: ''
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities: []
events:
  - name: TweenBase.Completed
    summary: |
      Fires when the tween finishes playing or when stopped with
      Class.TweenBase:Cancel().
    description: |
      Fires when the tween finishes playing or when stopped with
      Class.TweenBase:Cancel().

      Passes the Enum.PlaybackState of the tween to any connected functions to
      give an indication of why the tween ended. Note that calling
      Class.TweenBase:Pause() does not fire the Completed event.
    codesamples:
      - Tween-Completed
      - Tween-Conflict
      - Tween-Completed-2
    parameters:
      - name: playbackState
        type: PlaybackState
        default:
        summary: |
          The Enum.PlaybackState of the tween upon completion.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    capabilities: []
callbacks: []
